# Max Int32

> Maximum [signed 32-bit integer][max-int32].

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var INT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int32-max' );
```

#### INT32_MAX

Maximum [signed 32-bit integer][max-int32].

``` javascript
INT32_MAX === 2147483647;
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var INT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int32-max' );

console.log( INT32_MAX );
// => 2147483647
```

<!-- </examples> -->


<!-- <links> -->

[max-int32]: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2147483647
